author: Simon Difford
description: This unusual Daiquiri leads with sweet maraschino and finishes with sour grapefruit.
name: Ribalaigua Daiquiri
recipeIngredient: 60 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum
15 ml Chilled water (omit if wet ice)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
